universes.name: Harry Potter
universes.description: The magical world where wizards and witches study at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, battling dark forces led by Lord Voldemort.

universes.name: Star Wars
universes.description: A galaxy far, far away where the Jedi and Sith, as well as various species and planets, are central to a conflict between the light and dark sides of the Force.

universes.name: Tomb Raider
universes.description: An adventurous world where Lara Croft explores ancient tombs and archaeological sites, often uncovering mysteries and treasures.

universes.name: Star Trek
universes.description: A futuristic vision of space exploration, where starships like the USS Enterprise journey through the cosmos and encounter various alien species and civilizations.

universes.name: Alice's Adventures in Wonderland
universes.description: A whimsical and fantastical world where Alice encounters bizarre and surreal creatures, puzzles, and adventures.

universes.name: Marvel Comics
universes.description: A vast comic book universe filled with superheroes and supervillains, featuring iconic characters like Thor, Iron Man, and Spider-Man.

universes.name: Oz
universes.description: A magical land created by L. Frank Baum, where characters like Dorothy and the Scarecrow embark on whimsical adventures.

universes.name: Big Hero 6
universes.description: A futuristic city where a team of young heroes, along with their inflatable healthcare companion Baymax, fight against supervillains.

universes.name: The Chronicles of Narnia
universes.description: A magical realm created by C.S. Lewis, where children journey through a wardrobe to discover a world filled with talking animals, mythical creatures, and epic adventures.
Equestria is a magical and colorful world inhabited by adorable ponies, each with their own unique abilities and personalities. It's a land filled with friendship, adventures, and enchanting wonders.
